https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gzJn9fQTSFLNL93PUhyatS4kGog.jpg Silverio, a renowned Mexican journalist and documentary filmmaker living in Los Angeles, who, after being named the recipient of a prestigious international award, is compelled to return to his native country, unaware that this simple trip will push him to an existential limit.
